author: Anne Steele
title: Spotify on Track for Third-Largest Tech IPO Ever
text:
Spotify Technology SA roared onto the public market Tuesday as the music-streaming giant pulled off an unusual method of going public.
The stock, at 4 p.m. ET, was at $149.01, giving the music-streaming company a market value of $26.5 billion. At that level, Spotify would be among the top-ten biggest tech IPOs at the end of the first day of trading, behind Googleâ€™s debut in 2004, according to Dealogic.
